name: logarithmic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a logarithm (= a number that shows how many times a number has to be multiplied by itself to produce another number): Decibels are measured on a logarithmic scale. These variables were transformed using a logarithmic transformation. See
logarithm
More examplesFewer examplesYields and returns had to be worked out by logarithmic tables, since there were no electronic calculators.The Richter scale is logarithmic, not linear.Logarithmic graph paper is calibrated so that a logarithmic graph appears as a straight line.
